hadiths.text: Jabir reported the Messenger of Allah(ﷺ) as sayings:when one of you is invited to a meal, he must accept. If he wishes he may eat, but if he wishes(to leave), he may leave

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي إِجَابَةِ الدَّعْوَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been reported about accepting invitations
